description: Email Client access permissions for account management, messaging, and settings

permissions.name: Read Email
permissions.description: Read and view email messages in own accounts

permissions.name: Send Email
permissions.description: Compose and send email messages from own accounts

permissions.name: Update Email Status
permissions.description: Mark emails as read, star, archive, or apply labels

permissions.name: Delete Email
permissions.description: Delete or move email messages to trash

permissions.name: Manage Email Accounts
permissions.description: Add, edit, delete email accounts and configure IMAP/SMTP settings

permissions.name: Sync Email
permissions.description: Synchronize email accounts and fetch new messages

permissions.name: Email Administrator
permissions.description: Full administrative access to all email accounts and system settings

resources.name: Email
resources.description: Email system resources including accounts and messages

roles.name: Email User
roles.description: Standard user who can manage own email accounts and messages

roles.name: Email Administrator
roles.description: System administrator with full control over email system
